–í–∞–º –Ω–∞–¥–∞–¥—É—Ç—å —Ä–æ–ª—å —ñ –¥–æ–¥–∞–¥—É—Ç—å —É —Ä–æ–±–æ—á—ñ —á–∞—Ç–∏.

items.–ê–Ω–≥–ª –ø–æ–≤—ñ–¥–æ–º–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—è:
Good morning!

Here are your first day instructions ‚Äî please follow them step by step.

**Discord**
Connect to our Discord server: https://bit.ly/rhs_ds

Once connected, you'll automatically enter the Lounge chat.
Go to your profile and set your name and surname in English so we can easily find you :)

You will be assigned a role and added to your department chats.

Our Discord includes all company departments: Marketing, HR, PM, and others.
Most often, you'll work with your team and Admin.

‚Ä¢ **Admin**
‚Äî Lounge ‚Äî all company news

Your department is marked as follows:
# ‚Äî text channel
üé§ ‚Äî voice channel

Find the voice channel **HR FM**, join it and stay until 09:30. At 09:30 you'll have onboarding.

All details in this file:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1hQXfef9Kn1TVrFUMcJm_WJy8KSR3APRysaZEzdiNN30/edit?tab=t.0

**CRM Access Instructions**

Next, go to our CRM system: https://crm-s.com/login
Login: ________________
Password: ________________

1. Navigate to the **Dashboard** tab and click **Clock In** (allow geolocation).
2. **Break** ‚Äì for lunch breaks
3. **Clock Out** ‚Äì to end your workday
4. **Write Report** ‚Äì to submit your daily report

Then, go to your personal profile (icon in the lower-left corner).
Fill in your information. Fields marked with a red asterisk (*) are mandatory!
If already filled, please double-check everything for accuracy.

Make sure to enter your work email and LinkedIn profile in CRM.
Once all data is entered, click **Update**.

items.–í—ñ–¥–ø–æ–≤—ñ–¥—å –∞–Ω–≥–ª: It‚Äôs a standard employment contract. We sign an agreement in line with local regulations.
Salary is determined individually, based on your experience, skills, and desired range. Bonuses may apply.
Yes, we provide onboarding and team support for new employees.
Yes, regular salary reviews are held based on performance.
Outstaffing is when you are officially employed by us but work on tasks for clients we assign. We handle all organizational aspects.
No, we assign projects that match your experience, skills, and preferences.
Even if you are not assigned to a project, you remain employed. We‚Äôll keep searching for a new suitable project.

items.–ê–Ω–≥–ª –ø–æ–≤—ñ–¥–æ–º–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—è: Main tasks: LinkedIn research, finding contacts and companies, communicating with potential clients, organizing calls for the sales team, maintaining English correspondence, and CRM work.
Develop AI applications focused on NLP, integrate AI features into products, improve AI performance and UX, and stay updated on AI advancements.
Create static and animated ad creatives, contribute to concepts, design banners, prepare presentations, edit videos (resize, subtitles), and closely collaborate with marketing.

items.Name: CV Extraction (TSV Output)
items.Prompt:
Extract the following fields from the provided PDF CV and output a single-line TSV (tab-separated) string in this exact order:
Name Candidate	Source	Country	Channel Communication	Email	phone	Telegram	Status	Last Contact Date	Department	Profession	Language	Language level	Portfolio	CV

Strict extraction and formatting rules:
- All extracted values must be in English only, including Department and Profession.
- If a field is missing, insert a dash ("-").
- "Source" is always "Djinni" for designers and "Worh" for managers or leadgen. Identify role by Profession field.
- "Country" is always "Ukraine" unless another country is explicitly mentioned in the document.
- "Status" is always "Application".
- "Last Contact Date" is always today‚Äôs date in DD-MM-YYYY format.
- "Language" is always "English".
- "Language level" is always "B1".
- "Channel Communication" is always "Telegram".
- Department and Profession must strictly match the allowed list below. If profession is not listed, set both Department and Profession as "-".
- Allowed Departments and Professions (English only):

3d designer ‚Äî designers
account manager ‚Äî managers
affiliate manager ‚Äî marketers
analyst ‚Äî managers
animator ‚Äî videographers
back end developer ‚Äî developers
chat operator ‚Äî managers
content manager ‚Äî marketers
copywriter ‚Äî marketers
email marketer ‚Äî marketers
event manager ‚Äî managers
financial manager ‚Äî managers
front end developer ‚Äî developers
full stack developer ‚Äî developers
graphic designer ‚Äî designers
hr manager ‚Äî managers
illustrator ‚Äî designers
influencer manager ‚Äî marketers
interior designer ‚Äî designers
investment manager ‚Äî managers
lead generator ‚Äî managers
linkbuilder ‚Äî marketers
media buyer ‚Äî marketers
mobile developer ‚Äî developers
mobile video editor ‚Äî videographers
motion designer ‚Äî videographers
personal assistant ‚Äî managers
ppc specialist ‚Äî marketers
pr manager ‚Äî marketers
project manager ‚Äî managers
proofreader ‚Äî marketers
qa ‚Äî developers
recruiter ‚Äî managers
sales manager ‚Äî managers
seo manager ‚Äî marketers
social media manager ‚Äî marketers
system administrator ‚Äî developers
targetologist ‚Äî marketers
tourism manager ‚Äî managers
ui/ux designer ‚Äî designers
video editor ‚Äî videographers
web designer ‚Äî designers
wordpress designer ‚Äî designers

If the CV does not contain Telegram, leave the field as "-" so that it can be added manually later.
For "Portfolio" and "CV", extract portfolio links and attach the text or link to the CV if available, otherwise use "-".
Return only the requested single-line TSV output with no extra commentary.

items.Name: Resume Evaluation
items.Prompt: Evaluate this resume according to these criteria: experience relevance, technical skills, soft skills, and motivation. Provide a short feedback and specific suggestions for improvement.

items.Name: Rejection Email to Candidate
items.Prompt: Compose a polite and professional rejection email to a candidate after an interview. The tone should be positive, leave a good impression, and encourage the possibility of future cooperation.

items.Name: Junior Frontend Interview Questions
items.Prompt: Prepare a list of 7 interview questions for a Junior Frontend Developer. For each question, specify what the question is designed to assess.
